title: Southwest Spring Firefly
subtitle: The Gateway Bug
description: In this episode of Rarefied, host Meredith Meeker introduces listeners to the Southwest Spring Firefly, an understudied species primarily found in Arizona. Joined by Rachel Laura, Deputy Executive Director at Friends of the Verde River and a PhD student at the University of Arizona, the episode dives into the unique characteristics, life cycle, and habitat of this rare firefly. Rachel shares insights from her field research, including the challenges of studying an imperiled species and the importance of conserving wetland habitats.
